function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Different office plans may impact the spread of contagious diseases due to varying spatial layouts and density of people.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, potential for outbreaks, and compromised health and safety of occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures such as proper ventilation, spacing out workstations, and enforcing hygiene protocols can lower the probability of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Use of air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, and smart building technologies to monitor and control indoor air quality and occupancy.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and staff in the office building.","Owner":"Building management, architects, and facility managers."}]}
